Name: Dragon Hotel
Description: Casual rooms with free Wi-Fi, plus an upscale restaurant, a fitness centre and an indoor pool.

Name: Mercure Swansea Hotel
Description: Modest rooms & suites in an informal hotel with a bar offering 24-hour dining, plus an indoor pool.

Name: Beachcomber
Description: Beach-facing B&B offering simple rooms, in addition to full English breakfast & free WiFi.

Name: A Space In The City - Meridian Tower
Morgans Hotel
Description: Upscale rooms in a classic 1902 building with free Wi-Fi, plus a European restaurant and 2 bars.

Name: Village Hotel Swansea
Description: Modern waterside rooms with free Wi-Fi, plus an indoor pool, a restaurant and a coffee shop.

Name: The Mirador
Description: Ornate, themed B&B doubles and suites including French, African and Venetian, plus free WiFi.

Name: The Grand Hotel
Description: Relaxed quarters, some with hot tubs, in a classic 1930s hotel offering a sports bar & restaurant.

Name: Leonardo's Guest House
Description: Airy rooms with free Wi-Fi in a modest seafront guesthouse offering secure bike storage.

Name: Tudor Court Hotel
Description: No-frills rooms with Wi-Fi in an unfussy hotel, plus free breakfast, a bar & a game room.
